content_html:
Sponsored Post.
DATAx Guide to AI in Marketing
DOWNLOAD YOUR FREE EBOOK TODAY
  DOWNLOAD EBOOK  

With 94% of marketers focusing on building better, more personalized customer experience, how can they utilise AI, data segmentation, digital natives, influencers, apps and the internet to help them? Find out how technology is transforming the scale of the marketers remit by download our ebook 'DATAx: Guide to AI in Marketing'.
 
Inside Snapshot:
 
  • Effective marketing through new technologies and social media
  • Incorporating AI and automation as vital components of data strategies
  • Overcoming the challenges of building trust in the digital age
  • Ensuring ROI from data-driven personalization campaigns
DOWNLOAD THE EBOOK

DATA SCIENCE IN THE REAL WORLD

With distinct tracks set around machine learning, healthcare, gaming analytics, marketing and data leadership, DATAx San Francisco curates the latest thinking in artificial intelligence and data science to shape the future of your business, with a combination of deep, technical demonstrations and practical advice for data strategy.

Get inspired with actionable insights from leading brands, experience cutting edge technology and connect with peers at the forefront of the data revolution.

WHEN: May 14 & 15, 2019
WHERE: Marriott Marquis, San Francisco
REGISTER YOUR PLACE NOW WITH $200 LESS

LEADING FEATURES INCLUDE
100 SPEAKERS
 
Be privy to the insights and minds of the leading brands in AI and data. Including presentations from Google, Microsoft, PlayStation, Reddit and many more.
 
DATAx LABS
 
New for DATAx San Francisco: Workshops pulling together the best practice advice in key areas such as, Democratization of AI, Data Ethics, Women in AI and Diversity.

Make sure to secure your pass as we only have 6 weeks! Use the code KD200 to hear the most topical and trendy data applications and technological case studies from all the brightest minds. 
SAVE $200
 

Follow us on Social Media
